PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-00842000-02-010,  ,  ,  JUS,  HRDC, 
PrecisOrder (a) authorizing the CHIEF UMPIRE to request a judge or former judge of a superior court or a judge or former judge appointed under an Act of Parliament or a provincial legislature, to ACT AS AN UMPIRE, (b) limiting the total number of umpires to forty (40), and (c) repealing Order in Council P.C. 1996-1097.
